attributes.action: have a long look at how aussie pm deals with non-aussies, "welcome to our country, but remember it is ours" this is how we should be dealing with things.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I truly believe that we should put our house in order, close borders for at least a year, deal with those seeking assylum quickly, eject those here illegally, do not give dole money and child benefit to foreigners,if they are not coming here to a job, then they must have a sponsor willing to pay for them. Those on community service should be sweeping streets, picking up litter, cleaning graffiti etc.  We should take a look at the Australians - they are proud to be Aussies and do not bow to policitcal correctness - which is how we should all feel.  If others do not like our  ways and beliefs and rules - go elsewhere!
